## 1

```{python}
import math

def neg_mul_5(li):
  return_list = []
  for i in li:
    if i % 5 == 0 and i < 0:
      return_list.append(i)
  return return_list

neg_mul_5([-10, 2, -5, -8, 16, 10, -2, -15])
```

## 2

```{python}
def neg_mul_5(li):
  return_list = []
  index = 0
  while index < len(li):
    if li[index] % 5 == 0 and li[index] < 0:
      return_list.append(li[index])
    index += 1
  return return_list

neg_mul_5([-10, 2, -5, -8, 16, 10, -2, -15])
```
